accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of the Vice President for Administration, University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-4/1/2.881, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 1988 June 29.
